mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES ( SEQ_M_NO.NEXTVAL, #{m_name}, #{m_id}, #{m_pwd}, #{m_gender}, #{m_date}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, #{m_address}, #{m_status}, SYSDATE, #{m_pic}, #{ m_genre, typeHandler=MyTypeHandler }, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PWD = #{m_pwd} WHERE M_EMAIL = #{m_email}
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PIC = #{ m_pic }, M_PICRENAMED = #{ m_picRenamed }
mapper.select: SELECT P_LIST, C_LIST FROM BOOKMARK JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE M_NO = #{m_no}
